name: Immortal (2016)
description: Twenty-two year old Nicholas has just gotten off work. After rejecting a co-workers's invitation to go out, he decides to head home. While taking the bus home, he meets a twenty-four year old writer named Morna and the bus driver, twenty year old, Darcey. The bus soon breaks down, leaving Nicholas, Morna, and Darcey stranded outside a large manor. What lies in this manor will not only change how they see the world but also who they are.
